message:
Guys I have 2 questions about Django and AWS and Postgresql
1. Can anyone of you help me with finding a guide to deploy a Django app on AWS free tier ? 

2. Is it possible to run more than one http server on the same machine? for example if I'm using RESTful design and a service implemented in Python and another one is implemented in PHP .. Can I run Python and PHP server on the same machine ? and if yes how to do it ?

Thanks geeks

data.message:
for 1st request 
check this http://docs.aws.amazon.com/elasticbeanstalk/latest/dg/create_deploy_Python_django.html
and 2nd: you can run PHP as usual on Apache and to run run python on Apache you will need to use of mod_wsgi
Islam Ali do you have example link to make it clear ? .. I can deploy my main django app and if I needed to write other service in PHP or JS I just install their servers .. am i getting you right ?
